info.title: Football - Other
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. Football - Other

get.summary: The football leagues endpoint serves as a decode f...
get.description: The football leagues endpoint serves as a decode for the available leagues names, abbreviations, and URI paths.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The teams endpoint will be your source for team na...
get.description: The teams endpoint will be your source for team names, locations, abbreviations, and IDs.  You can get information about a single team by including the teamId.  If you do not include a teamId, you will get all the teams for the league.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-plays, and drive charts. The box, pbp, & driveCharts parameters are only available when a single game is selected.
 Simple schedules are also available via the events endpoint.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp or driveCharts parameters.
 Default - basic schedule and score information is returned.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: driveCharts
parameters.description:
Returns the drive charts for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'driveCharts=true'.
  Default - drive chart data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
A full line score can be requested with any combination of parameters.
  Default - line score data will not be returned.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, all games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description: Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-plays, and drive charts. However box scores, play-by-play, and drive charts are available for a single game only, and so acnnot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

A full line score can be requested with any combination of parameters.
  Default - line score data will not be returned.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, all games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for football events. (Play-by-play and Drive Charts are not available in the box endpoint.)

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp or driveCharts parameters.
 Default - basic schedule and score information is returned.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
A full line score can be requested with any combination of parameters.
  Default - line score data will not be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, all games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for football events. However, box scores are available for a single game only, and so cannot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team.
 Default - false

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

get.summary: The participants endpoint provides biographical in...
get.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for players and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, or all teams rosters within the league.

parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: teamId

 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

get.summary: Football - Season & Career stats for a single play...
get.description: Football - Season & Career stats for a single player

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
The 'enc'yclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
 Notes:
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.  If playerId is omitted, 'enc=true' will be ignored.
  If 'enc=true', the seasonId will be ignored if included.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Football - Player splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned.
 * If 'all' is used, then all the splits are returned.
 * If not used, only the official totals will be returned (default = -1).
 * Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
 -- A full list of the available splitId codes can be found using the âdecodesâ resource.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Football - Leaders

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Passing Yards).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: nonQualifiers
parameters.description:
Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Football - Odds

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the football/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Valid only when event type is Postseason.
 Default - All rounds combined

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: decodeType
parameters.description: The data type to be decoded.
